DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test how BMS-247550 (ixabepilone) affects the removal of capecitabine from the body and how capecitabine affects the removal of BMS-247550 from the body.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Capecitabine on the Pharmacokinetics of BMS-247550 and BMS-247550 on the Pharmacokinetics of Capecitabine and Its Metabolites in Patients With Advanced Malignancies
DOC.criteria: Recovery from surgery or radiation therapy Measurable or nonmeasurable disease Available for followup Neuropathy Uncontrolled pulmonary or cardiovascular disease Known history of HIV infection
